long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AutoJoomer is a Chrome extension for IIIT Kottayam students that ensures instance access to their timetables, timetables, mess menu etc.

You only need to save your LMS Username and LMS Password in the extension and you are good to go.

Features:
Auto-login to college's wifi network & LMS portal
And many more to come
